Subject: Introduction to Parkour Featuring Phoenix Freerunning Academy
Description: Parkour is a physical movement discipline that focuses on getting from point A to point B in the most efficient way possible, navigating obstacles along the way, most often in urban environments. Phoenix Freerunning Academy is a parkour and freerunning gym in Livonia that teaches the discipline of parkour and the instructors from this gym will be returning to Penguicon to host another Introduction to Parkour workshop in which we will both demonstrate some of our abilities as well as teach you how to jump, how to roll, how to balance and we will go over some of the basic vaults, including safety, speed and kong!   Speakers include:Jesse Harrison, Anthony Rembisz, Raymond Guzzo - Track: Action Adventure  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
